Key Match Events: Khvicha Kvaratskhelia scored the first goal in only 93 seconds
Georges Mikautadze scored a penalty kick in the 57th minute
Giorgi Mamardashvili made crucial saves in added time to keep the lead
Pre-Game Insights: Cristiano Ronaldo inspired Khvicha Kvaratskhelia and Georgia before the game
Portugal's Ronaldo is still without a goal at Euro 2024
Post-Match Reflections: Kvaratskhelia described the win as the best day of his life
Ronaldo received a yellow card for protesting a penalty decision
Portugal coach Roberto Martinez criticized inconsistent video reviews and admitted his team didn't match Georgia's intensity
Miscellaneous Highlights: Georgian fans celebrated with a 'Believe' banner
Portugal was already qualified from Group F but kept three players in the lineup
